a.title: Joel Barlow High School Sign
Helen Keller Middle School
RES Sign
JRMS Sign
Photo of Sunflower in RES Garden

img.alt: Photo of Sunflower in RES Garden

p.span: ER9 represents three separate school districts. Easton (E) and Redding (R) are each Pre-Kindergarten to Grade 8 school districts. They share a high school, Joel Barlow High School, which is its own separate school district (Region 9 -- the "9" in ER9). Each of the three districts has its own Board of Education and shares a Central Office which is located in Easton.
